import React from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import FeeCard from './FeeCard'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ frame: { width: '753px', height: '603.5px', backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF' }, texttitle: { fontSize: '22.6px', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#4A4A4A' }, subTitle: { fontSize: '19.4px', color: '#4A4A4A' }, namebed: { fontSize: '16px', color: '#4A4A4A' }, inframe: { width: 686, height: 522, background: 'red', marginTop: 20 } })); export default function DisplayDialog() { const classes = useStyles() return (
Room Type
Room: 102 • 104 • 107
Room Type Name
Number of Bed
Select Fee Type
) }
